description:
Tribute to Heinrich Baermann (1784-1847)

"Beauty of fullness of tone can be achieved by having the whole orchestra play with high clarinets and a carefully selected number of piccolos."

I've always wanted to play clarinet, or even touch it. And I've always curious how it makes beautiful sounds, until Squidward 'make it'. Hm.

2400x2600 | hand-drawn digitally on procreate
